name: Galarian Cursola
flavorText: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon's core spirit.

abilities.name: Perish Body
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.
